data.title: The Pleasure of His Company: A Rueful Comedy
data.meta_description: Hardcover. First edition. Fine in very good dustwrapper with one internally repair tear, and tanning and a faint stain on the rear panel. Skinner appeared in the Broadway production, along with a young George Peppard. Filmed in 1961 by George Seaton with Fred Astaire, Debbie Reynolds, Lilli Palmer, and Tab Hunter. Item #67796
data.text:
Hardcover. First edition. Fine in very good dustwrapper with one internally repair tear, and tanning and a faint stain on the rear panel. Skinner appeared in the Broadway production, along with a young George Peppard. Filmed in 1961 by George Seaton with Fred Astaire, Debbie Reynolds, Lilli Palmer, and Tab Hunter.

Item #67796
